channel.title: Usages on Co-pilot-cli
channel.description: Recent content in Usages on Co-pilot-cli

item.title: Configuration
item.description: The first time running co-pilot a ~/.co-pilot configuration folder is created with a ~/.co-pilot/local-config.yaml file. The contents of this file by default are: cloudConfig: git: url: https://github.com/co-pilot-cli/co-pilot-config.git

item.title: Docker
item.description: A docker image with the latest co-pilot binary is available at https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/copilotcli/co-pilot-cli

item.title: Install
item.description: Co-pilot sources are available at https://github.com/co-pilot-cli/co-pilot Download git clone https://github.com/co-pilot-cli/co-pilot.git Install make Help co-pilot
